name: @ldraney/mcp-linkedin
description: MCP server for managing LinkedIn posts - create text, image, video, document, poll, and multi-image posts. Schedule posts, add comments and reactions.

linkedin_client_id.title: Client ID (optional)
linkedin_client_id.description: LinkedIn OAuth app client ID - leave blank to set up via chat

linkedin_client_secret.title: Client Secret (optional)
linkedin_client_secret.description: LinkedIn OAuth app client secret - leave blank to set up via chat

linkedin_redirect_uri.title: Redirect URI (optional)
linkedin_redirect_uri.description: OAuth callback URL - defaults to https://localhost:8888/callback

linkedin_person_id.title: Person ID (optional)
linkedin_person_id.description: Your LinkedIn person ID - obtained automatically during OAuth

linkedin_access_token.title: Access Token (optional)
linkedin_access_token.description: OAuth access token - obtained via linkedin_exchange_code tool
